meanings.definition: The quality or state of being openhearted.
meanings.sent1: Her openheartedness made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your openheartedness towards others.
meanings.sent3: His openheartedness even extended to stray animals.
meanings.sent4: The openheartedness of the community was like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The openheartedness in her smile was contagious.

meanings.definition: A generous and kind attitude or behavior towards others.
meanings.sent1: The openheartedness of the volunteers was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent2: She showed her openheartedness by helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: Their openheartedness shone through in times of crisis.
meanings.sent4: The openheartedness of the group was like a beacon of light.
